description: It's 2017 and 'serverless' is all the rage. What exactly is it and how can we use it? Will it save us money? Will it allow us to scale? When should we use it? How do we use it? In this talk I'll outline the who, what, when, where, why and how of serverless and when to use it to save money and time.
title: Serverless, what is it good for?
